channel.title: Moparscape Moderators
channel.description: Why have so many more people gained this status?

item.title: Moparscape Moderators
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:28, topic:207455”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=273426.msg2238894#msg2238894 date=1211565677]

The Help/Development section seems to be under control a little more. To be honest, a wipe would be helpful in the Help/Development (Easier on the moderators) since the mods could get on top of the threads and begin controlling the section fully.

Everything seems to be better now with these guys as mods… They’re all active, which is a great help since the moderators in the past went inactive after a couple of months due to boredom, I guess.

I have requested a wipe for that section many times, it just never happened and the admins didn’t agree.
Atm I’m busy irl, that’s why I’m not that active on the forum or irc these weeks.

In all seriousness, no one was asking you why you weren’t here.

Doesn’t matter, I feel like explaining it instead of having people pming me ‘l0l ur protesting against the new modz’
[/quote]

COWIE CRUSH[/quote]
YZ YELL

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape Moderators
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:9, topic:207455”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=273426.msg2237924#msg2237924 date=1211510502]
Me, Casey, Yz85Racer and ``jason are the only new moparscape mods.
[/quote]
Good bunch of people =]

Also I didn’t want to ask but now someone’s actually moderated “Click Here” I thought I might ask. Why and how did Click Here get to be Moparscape mod? Just wondering as I can think of other people who are much fitter for the position, and judging by the posts I’ve seen of “Click Here” he/she isn’t very fit for the job.

Click Here: If you are reading this, sorry no hard feelings but I just haven’t seen much positive stuff from you.[/quote]
Basically /she/?(Not sure) spammed a thread…with 1’s. =.=’ - “Should have given a good example to the community” was basically the dot reason…

Read full topic
